ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 75
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been playing from the date of release last year, I have 5 chars that I like to play; but in the beginning I could not decide on a race/class - so I
ygData.messageBody:
I have been playing from the date of release last year, I have 5 chars that
I like to play; but in the beginning I could not decide on a race/class - so
I started and deleted about 6 chars (geeze what a waste of time!) Anyway I
have two main chars one is a lvl 35 DE Necro named Karrma Sutra and one is a
DE Cleric named Kilanna. My question is how in the heck to you guys get to
lvl 50 so fast? I don't see 50 in my future for months and months! But of
course I play an average of 2 hours a day, except on weekends - that may
have something to do with it! Any suggestions? Also I have a ranger that
was recently started - I totally love playing her! But she is still a baby.
